mapper.select: SELECT SUM(price) AS "price", (SELECT COUNT(orderKey) FROM totalOrder WHERE rdate BETWEEN '${NOWDATE} ${NOWTIME}:00:00' AND '${NOWDATE} ${NOWTIME}:59:59' AND (status LIKE 'D' OR status LIKE 'S')) AS "itemCnt", (SELECT COUNT(orderKey) FROM totalOrder WHERE rdate BETWEEN '${NOWDATE} ${NOWTIME}:00:00' AND '${NOWDATE} ${NOWTIME}:59:59' AND status NOT LIKE 'F' ) AS "status", (SELECT COUNT(orderKey) FROM totalOrder WHERE rdate BETWEEN '${NOWDATE} ${NOWTIME}:00:00' AND '${NOWDATE} ${NOWTIME}:59:59' AND status LIKE 'F') AS "refund", (SELECT SUM(od.cnt) FROM totalOrder t JOIN orderDetail od ON od.orderKey = t.orderKey WHERE rdate BETWEEN '${NOWDATE} ${NOWTIME}:00:00' AND '${NOWDATE} ${NOWTIME}:59:59' AND status NOT LIKE 'F') AS "totalSales" FROM totalOrder WHERE rdate BETWEEN '${NOWDATE} ${NOWTIME}:00:00' AND '${NOWDATE} ${NOWTIME}:59:59' AND status NOT LIKE 'F';
